Chris Darby aids in medical rescue, calls out ‘systemic’ delays in rural emergency response https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/chris-darby-aids-in-medical-rescue-calls-out-systemic-delays-in-rural-emergency-response/RUQ7E7LMHNDJLA7V43NE47NHAI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/chris-darby-aids-in-medical-rescue-calls-out-systemic-delays-in-rural-emergency-response/RUQ7E7LMHNDJLA7V43NE47NHAI/ Natasha GordonThe response "should have taken 10 minutes but it took an hour and a half.” Sat, 07 Sep 2024 06:07:01 +0000 Chris Darby. Large Otago vegetation fire being fought by six helicopters and two planes, contained https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/large-otago-vegetation-fire-being-fought-by-six-helicopters-and-two-planes/V4NXKTQ5SRH4ZD6QA6HPUDOECA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/large-otago-vegetation-fire-being-fought-by-six-helicopters-and-two-planes/V4NXKTQ5SRH4ZD6QA6HPUDOECA/ Ben LeahyFire teams called in more resources this morning to fight the blaze. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 05:25:50 +0000 Six helicopters and two planes are battling a large vegetation fire in Otago in the South Island that is expected to burn for days to come. File photo / Fire and Emergency NZ
Two arrested after reversing into patrol car, driving towards two police officers in Wellington https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/two-arrested-after-reversing-into-patrol-car-driven-towards-two-police-officers-in-wellington/UULL4OG63ZFHBBK6IZLYCIGDKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/two-arrested-after-reversing-into-patrol-car-driven-towards-two-police-officers-in-wellington/UULL4OG63ZFHBBK6IZLYCIGDKU/ The pair then stole a member of the public's car and took off on Transmission Gully. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 05:06:22 +0000 The officers were not injured, but the patrol car sustained considerable damage. Photo / File
Colombia-linked cocaine syndicate in rural Canterbury imported drugs worth millions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/colombia-linked-cocaine-syndicate-in-rural-canterbury-imported-drugs-worth-millions/WIQCIYV3CFDC7JZMVKX4YC27YY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/colombia-linked-cocaine-syndicate-in-rural-canterbury-imported-drugs-worth-millions/WIQCIYV3CFDC7JZMVKX4YC27YY/ Ric StevensCriminal group imported, or tried to import, $100m of drugs. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Some of the cocaine, cash and other items displayed by police when they busted the Canterbury drugs ring. They include parts for a heating system that had cocaine inside it, and the X-ray of a truck carrying a container in which drugs were hidden, taken in Spain. Photo / George Heard
Hamilton child homicide: Family of Zahquiel Taipeti files IPCA complaint against police https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/hamilton-child-homicide-family-of-zahquiel-taipeti-files-ipca-complaint-against-police/BQPQZHRQ75ELFKU7PFBHL65PW4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/hamilton-child-homicide-family-of-zahquiel-taipeti-files-ipca-complaint-against-police/BQPQZHRQ75ELFKU7PFBHL65PW4/ Maryana GarciaPolice also notified the IPCA the alleged killer was trespassed on the day of the murder. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 03:55:38 +0000 Eight year old Zahquiel Taipeti was the 8-year-old who died following an attack in the Hamilton suburb of Bader on Sunday. Photos / Mike Scott /supplied

Will wars: Daughter claimed she should get more from her father’s will than her siblings https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/will-wars-daughter-claimed-she-should-get-more-from-her-fathers-will-than-her-siblings/54R6HZ76IFEJBJUDNI24WCJ2TU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/will-wars-daughter-claimed-she-should-get-more-from-her-fathers-will-than-her-siblings/54R6HZ76IFEJBJUDNI24WCJ2TU/ Hannah BartlettThe daughter argued she'd done more to care for her parents than her eight siblings. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 02:00:00 +0000 A daughter claimed she should receive a double share of her father's will because she had done more for her parents than her eight siblings had.
Lack of reliable Waiheke lsland healthcare leaves resident ‘anxious’https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lack-of-reliable-waiheke-lsland-healthcare-leaves-resident-anxious/7SVDCRXZZFEXDNAU4VEBDYVATA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lack-of-reliable-waiheke-lsland-healthcare-leaves-resident-anxious/7SVDCRXZZFEXDNAU4VEBDYVATA/ It comes as Waiheke Island's only after-hours clinic abruptly closed last Friday. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 01:38:26 +0000 Waiheke Island is facing a shortage of doctors, and healthcare access has been further reduced by the abrupt closure of the island’s only after-hours clinic.
Kaipara mayor declines a moment of silence for Kīngi Tūheitia in council meeting https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/kaipara-mayor-declines-a-moment-of-silence-for-kingi-tuheitia-in-council-meeting/UGHM7PDBNRGQXGHGISMN6BE4GI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/kaipara-mayor-declines-a-moment-of-silence-for-kingi-tuheitia-in-council-meeting/UGHM7PDBNRGQXGHGISMN6BE4GI/ Daniel PereseIt was the council's first public meeting since the late Māori king died last Friday. Sat, 07 Sep 2024 01:14:58 +0000 Kaipara Mayor Craig Jepson declined a request for a moment's silence for the late Māori king, saying it was "not on the agenda". Photo / Tania Whyte
